title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
OB: When the steps in ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example are reproduced, and a new basic project is created with a new file test.xml, selecting test.xml in the Navigator and choosing Open With... / Default Text Editor, nothing happens. It should open a new editor on the file as the editor type is different.
EB: The file test.xml should be opened with the Default Text Editor.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file test.xml
3. Open the Navigator
4. Select test.xml
5. Right-click and choose Open With... / Default Text Editor
6. Verify that a new editor is opened for the test.xml file.
